title: Virtual Educational Material Development Competency Diagnosis and Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Competency development program for managers/leaders focusing on science education material development

learning_goals: Learners can explain principles of designing educational materials suitable for virtual environments with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can apply at least three specific ICT integration strategies when developing LMS-based educational materials.
Learners can create educational material suitability evaluation criteria with 90% accuracy based on target learner characteristic analysis.

resources: Access Permissions for LMS (Learning Management System) Platforms

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
